metadata.title: CVE-2020-25814 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In MediaWiki before 1.31.10 and 1.32.x through 1.34.x before 1.34.4, XSS related to jQuery can occur. The attacker creates a message with [javascript:payload xss] and turns it into a jQuery object with mw.message().parse(). The expected result is that the jQuery object does not contain an <a> tag (or it does not have a href attribute, or it's empty, etc.). The actual result is that the object contains an <a href ="javascript... that executes when clicked.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.35.0-1').
